content:
During the last day, the Aviation of Defense forces has struck 8 areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and military equipment and 1 enemy management point.

About thisinformsThe General Staff of the Armed Forces, reports the Armyinform.

At the same time, missile troops have led to:

  • 2 areas of concentration of personnel,
  • weapons and military equipment,
  • Buk-M1 anti-aircraft missile system,
  • Radar complex of the counter -battery struggle 1L219 "Zoo".

As reportedArmyinform,There were 72 fighting collisions during the last day.
title: Buk-M1, Zoo and Management: Ukrainian forces have struck the enemy
description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces informs about it, reports the Armyinform. At the same time, missile troops ...
author: Army Inform
